mapper.select: select branch.*, me_id as 'br_admin' from branch join member on me_name = br_name order by br_name;
mapper.insert: insert into branch(br_name, br_phone, br_postcode, br_address, br_detailAddress, br_extraAddress, br_detail) values(#{br.br_name}, #{br.br_phone}, #{br.br_postcode}, #{br.br_address}, #{br.br_detailAddress}, #{br.br_extraAddress}, #{br.br_detail});

insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_name, me_phone, me_address, me_birth, me_authority) values(#{me.me_id}, #{me.me_pw}, #{me.me_email}, #{me.me_name}, #{me.me_phone}, #{me.me_address}, current_timestamp(), "BRADMIN")
mapper.select: select * from member join branch on me_name = br_name where me_name = #{br.br_name};
select * from branch_file where bf_br_name = #{br.br_name} order by bf_num;
mapper.update: update branch set br_name = #{br.br_name}, br_phone = #{br.br_phone}, br_postcode = #{br.br_postcode}, br_address = #{br.br_address}, br_detailAddress = #{br.br_detailAddress}, br_extraAddress = #{br.br_extraAddress}, br_detail = #{br.br_detail} where br_name = #{br_ori_name};

update member set me_id = #{me.me_id}, me_pw = #{me.me_pw}, me_email = #{me.me_email}, me_name = #{me.me_name}, me_phone = #{me.me_phone}, me_address = #{me.me_address} where me_name = #{br_ori_name};
